meanings.definition: the act or practice of playing games of strategy in which players simulate warfare
meanings.sent1: During our wargaming session, we planned our moves carefully to outsmart the enemy.
meanings.sent2: The group gathered around the table for an intense wargaming session.
meanings.sent3: In wargaming, my friend always tries to surprise us with unexpected strategies.
meanings.sent4: His approach to business was like wargaming, always thinking several steps ahead.
meanings.sent5: The wargaming exercise helped us understand the importance of teamwork in strategy.

meanings.definition: a game or simulation involving military strategy and tactics
meanings.sent1: The new wargaming software allowed players to experience realistic military scenarios.
meanings.sent2: He spent hours mastering the rules of the wargaming board game.
meanings.sent3: During the wargaming tournament, everyone was eager to showcase their strategic skills.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a battlefield of wargaming scenarios, each one more challenging than the last.
meanings.sent5: The wargaming simulation provided a hands-on approach to learning military tactics.
